oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Leroy M. Sullivan correspondence with Grady M. Long, 1941 July 13
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Sullivan, Leroy M., 1921-1943
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from Leroy Sullivan to Grady Long addressing the details of Long's last letter and providing a report of his latest news, including making friends with an officer in the Royal Air Force. Sullivan also remarks on his latest pay raise, which brings his salary up to $70 a month.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Basic training (Military education); Soldiers -- United States -- History -- 20th century; Roc (Fighter plane); Spitfire (Fighter plane); World War, 1939-1945
Sullivan, Leroy M., 1921-1943
Canada. Royal Canadian Air Force; Great Britain. Royal Air Force. Squadron 56
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Leroy M. Sullivan correspondence with Grady M. Long, 1941-1943
Leroy M. Sullivan diaries and correspondence
